name: doctoral

relating to a doctorate (= the highest degree from a university): a doctoral dissertation She is a doctoral student in Applied Linguistics. Related word
doctorate
More examplesFewer examplesHe began a doctoral degree in education.I did my doctoral research on religious art.In 1966 he dropped out of a doctoral program at Stanford. She is a doctoral candidate at Yale.

relating to the highest-ranking degree given by a university: She’s a doctoral student in geology.
